titles.title: Supporting initiatives by President Trump to create a new age of American prosperity by reducing the crushing tax burden on American families and American companies.
Supporting initiatives by President Trump to create a new age of American prosperity by reducing the crushing tax burden on American families and American companies.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: Affirms the leadership and commitment of President Trump to simplify the tax code and supports tax policies such as raising the standard deduction, increasing the child tax credit, lowering rates, and changing the corporate tax system to a territorial system.
